translation.text: Train services are resuming between Goulburn and Campbelltown in both directions due to severe weather conditions affecting infrastructure at various locations earlier. Limited buses may supplement trains between Goulburn and Campbelltown to assist in conveying customers for any gaps in service. Customers are advised to avoid any non-essential travel to limit inconvenience. If customers must travel then please allow plenty of additional travel time as delays can be expected. Customers should also check indicator boards, listen to announcements and check Transport Apps for updates.

Train services are suspended between Bathurst/Lithgow and Lawson in both directions due to a landslide at Leura and infrastructure damage caused by earlier bushfires. A reduced frequency train service is operating between Lawson and Central. 
Due to the large number of buses required for incidents across multiple areas a very limited amount of buses are replacing trains between Bathurst/Lithgow and Lawson. 
- Due to the nature of the incident, we anticipate repair works to continue until at least the end of the week. 
- Please delay any non-essential travel. If you must travel then allow plenty of additional travel time as delays can be expected.
- Plan ahead before you travel.
- Check indicator boards, listen to announcements and check transport apps for service information.

Womens Football - Thailand V China and Australia V Chinese Taipei - Campbelltown Sports Stadium, Leumeah
16:30 to 21:30
- The closest station to Campbelltown Sports Stadium is Leumeah . The stadium is approximately 100m walk from the station.
due to severe weather conditions causing a landslip at Artarmon & urgent track equipment repairs at North Sydney

Due to a landslide at Leura, a tree caught in the overhead wiring at Blackheath and earlier infrastructure damage caused by bushfires. A very limited bus service is replacing trains between Springwood, Lithgow and Bathurst.

due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Hornsby

Customers, due to Wynyard station upgrade the lifts from George Street to Concourse Level will be closed from Saturday 08 February until July 2020.   During these works, Customers will be able use alternate lifts from Wynyard Station to Carrington Street and York Street accessed via Margaret Street.  For further information or assistance, Please follow station staff instructions, station signage or call Wynyard Station on 9224 2959.

Metro services are terminating and commencing from Maquarie Park station due to severe weather conditions. Replacement buses are in operation between Maquarie Park and Chatswood. Customers wishing to change for a Metro service should do so at Epping instead of Chatswood.
Station Update - Canley Vale, Cowan, Croydon and more

Glenbrook, Croydon, Canley Vale, Cowan & Strathfield Stations - External power supply issues are affecting platform screens, Opal card readers and station lighting. For Opal information or fare adjustments, please visit transportnsw.info/opal.

Due to external power supply issues affecting station infrastructure there is currently no power at Denistone station. Station indicator boards are currently not available and Opal is also affected. Customers are advised to request a fare adjustment at transportnsw.info/opal

The public toilets at Beverly Hills station are currently unavailable while major repairs take place. Temporary toilets have been provided and are located outside the station on Tooronga Terrace. These facilities can be accessed during staffed hours. We apologise for any inconvenience.

Due to station maintenance works, the pedestrian ramp between Richmond Platform 2 and the concourse is closed. If you are unable to use the stairs, a shuttle bus to and from East Richmond station will be available.   For further assistance, please see station staff or call 9851 7248.

The public toilets at St James Station are closed while major works are taking place. Public toilets are located at the Elizabeth Street entrance to the right and in Hyde Park through the Macquarie Street tunnel up the stairs to the right. We apologise for any inconvenience.
External power supply issues are affecting platform screens, rail infrastructure including lifts and P.A system. For assistance please contact the Station staff.

New Metro Platforms are being constructed on platforms 1 & 2 at Sydenham Station. T3 Bankstown Line services to the City operate from platform 3 & T3 Bankstown Line services to Lidcombe and Liverpool operate from platform 4. Platform 4, 5 & 6 upgrade works - A new Metro concourse is also being constructed at the Northern end of the station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. If you need help, please see staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info

Station Upgrade - Customers, due to Wynyard station upgrade the lifts from the concourse level to George Street will be closed from Saturday 8th February until July 2020. Customers will be able use alternate lifts from Wynyard Station to Carrington Street and York Street accessed via Margaret Street.  For further information or assistance, Please follow station staff instructions, station signage or call Wynyard Station on 9224 2959.
